title: Bleached Martian rocks offer fresh evidence of a wetter and warmer Mars: 'But where did they come from?
description: "You need so much water that we think these could be evidence of an ancient warmer and wetter climate where there was rain falling for millions of years."
content: "You need so much water that we think these could be evidence of an ancient warmer and wetter climate where there was rain falling for millions of years."
